features: ✔️COMFORTABLE GEL MEMORY FOAM CUSHION: GSPSCN's all-in-one features are unrivaled: Non-slip rubber bottom, Adjustable straps for preventing falling and machine-washable zippered velour cover for easy cleaning. The Coccyx Cushion is the best gel memory foam seat cushion on the market made of premium quality durable memory foam with cool off gel layer on top for superior comfort.

✔️HELP ALLEVIATE SCIATICA AND LOWER BACK PAIN: GSPSCN's coccyx pillow has been ergonomically designed to help take pressure off of the user’s lower back or tailbone and offers orthopedic tailbone pain relief while sitting. This gel cushion promotes healthy posture and proper spinal alignment.

✔️ERGONOMICALLY U-SHAPED : The U-shaped design, with its cut-out center and contoured surface, removes pressure from the coccyx to ensure the tailbone hovers over the surface of the seat, thereby alleviating any discomfort caused by sitting for extended periods.

✔️PORTABLE SUPPORT: Measuring 17.7” x 14” x 3.1” (45x36x8cm) at its highest point the orthopedic seat cushion is typically used in the following settings: office chair cushion, drivers car seat cushions, car passenger, lorry driver, airplane, buses and trains, wheelchairs,computer desk chair, hard kitchen/dining room chairs, football matches and other sporting events.

✔️PRACTICAL GIFT: The cushion can be used as a practical gift for family, friends, boss and colleagues. Excellent comfort, effective support for the tailbone, to relieve the pressure on the hip caused by sedentary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Made the wife happy
reviews.reviewText: When the wife likes it then you know it's good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great cushion. Very comfortable. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for tailbone pain but not great
reviews.reviewText: I injured my tailbone recently and my Dr said to get a pillow like this. First I bought the least expensive one I could find, figuring I could scale up on quality and price if it didn't do enough. It didn't. So I got this one instead, which at the time I ordered it cost almost 2x what I paid for the first pillow.Sadly, it's a lateral move, not an improvement. It just doesn't cushion enough to protect my injury and the foam seems to compress too much. It's far better than no cushioning at all, just not enough for my needs. And annoyingly, since I ordered it the price has dropped to match the bargain-quality pillow, further proving that this is on a par for quality with the first one I bought, not an improvement.But on the positive side, the strap to attach it to a chair is really helpful for keeping it in place, as are the non-slip dots on the bottom. The cooling gel is nice too, and it does seem to help keep me a little cooler than sitting on the plain memory foam cushion. Overall, I'd say it's probably better for helping to prevent tailbone pain from developing than for protecting a tailbone that's already injured.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New favorite cushion
reviews.reviewText: I write this review after sitting on the cushion for a while. It is comfortable even though I sit in the chair for a long time every day. The memory material is designed to fit very well with strong support. Also it does not get hot and sweaty even in summer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool and Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: This seat cushion is cool and comfortable! A cooling seat cushion is nice and helps relieve pain. It is super comfortable. It is ergonomic and fits in a standard size chair. It is a good price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cooling you can feel
reviews.reviewText: I have a mesh office chair that is supposed to be ergonomic but at the end of the day, it isn't comfy. Adding this cushion, I can tell I'm sinking in almost the full height of the cushion (I'm 5'5 and about 170 lbs.). Besides being comfier, I can also feel the cooling gel which given it's in the high 80's where I'm at, it's a nice touch. If you find your car seat, office chair, or any other chair isn't quite cutting it, I highly recommend adding a cushion to bring new life to it and extend it's functional time in your life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This cushion has been a great addition to my work chair. I sit at a desk for approximately 40 hours a week so my desk chair needs to be comfortable and this cushion has made it so much better! The combination of gel and memory foam provides support while contouring to your body. I do wish it was just a little bit firmer, as I think I "sink" down just a bit too much and would be more comfortable with a bit more firmness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This seat cushion is so comfortable! I have a desk job and I sit 8 hours a day. This seat cushion helps to soothe any back pain, butt pain, leg pain, that I may have. The cushion does not go flat when you sit on it it has a cooling sensation so I don't sweat. I highly recommend this product!
